nodes.speaker: Marcus
nodes.text: They keep pushing my locker and laughing. I'm not sure why they're picking on me.

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: Do you want me to come with you to tell a teacher, or would you rather handle it yourself?

choices.text: I'll go with you to tell a teacher.
Teach you a few assertive phrases you can use.
Help you avoid them and find quiet routes.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: You accompany Marcus to the teacher and explain what happened. The teacher promises to watch and intervene.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: You practice short, calm lines with Marcus. He tries them the next day and one bully backs off.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: You find alternate paths for Marcus for a few days. It helps reduce encounters quickly.

nodes.speaker: Marcus
nodes.text: Thanks. It feels less lonely knowing someone cares. I'll try talking to the teacher if it happens again.
